faqs.question: What types of construction projects do you handle?
faqs.answer: We manage a wide range of projects — from residential buildings and commercial spaces to industrial plants and infrastructure development.

faqs.question: How long does it usually take to complete a project?
faqs.answer: Project duration depends on scale and complexity. Typically, residential projects take 6–12 months, while large commercial ones may take 12–24 months.

faqs.question: What is your construction workflow?
faqs.answer: We follow a systematic approach: planning, designing, material sourcing, execution, and quality check before delivery.

faqs.question: Do you offer cost estimation or free quotes?
faqs.answer: Yes! We provide detailed cost estimation and free project consultation before starting any work to ensure full transparency.

faqs.question: How do you ensure quality and safety during construction?
faqs.answer: We follow strict quality control, use certified materials, and comply with all safety protocols — supervised by experienced engineers.

faqs.question: What after-service do you provide post project completion?
faqs.answer: We offer maintenance guidance, repair support, and warranty coverage for specific materials and installations.
